item.title: Colloque GRETSI'17
item.description: I will be presenting our work about Random Feature Maps at Colloque GRETSI’17 this September!

item.title: ICASSP'17: Lecture section: Deep Learning IV
item.description:
Time: Thursday, March 9, 13:30 - 15:30

Location: Lecture Room 6

Here is the link to this four-paper conference paper. A extended journal version which contains all proof in detail is available here.

The slides presented on ICASSP 2017 is available here.
